articles.content:
Tottenham have made a late bid to prise Wales winger Daniel James away from Leeds. 
Antonio Conte wants James and Spurs have put out some feelers to gauge his availability. But Leeds are adamant the… [+2956 chars]

articles.title: Barcelona's Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang 'given psychological treatment' after robbery ordeal - Daily Mail
